about_the_game:
Blister Blight is a story-rich 8-bit action-platformer that fuses classic "run and gun" side-scrolling gameplay with a branching story reminiscent of modern roleplaying games. With each level you play and boss you encounter, you will make decisions that permanently affect the outcomes of other characters and plot-lines.

These levels can be played in any order, granting you the autonomy to chart your own course to one of several possible endings. No two paths will be exactly the same – surprises await the curious and challenges await the courageous!

About the Demo

In the demo, you'll get a great taste of the action and mechanics of Blister Blight, traversing through the subway and its depths, making your way to confront Judge Blight at the courthouse. What paths will you take? What weapons will you use for each battle? What awaits you at the end of the line? Adventure awaits!
